title: Patiti Patati
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Fast food, Take-out, Fusion, Turkish
description: Opened Apr 2014. Its main dish is kumpir, the Turkish version of the baked potato, where the potato gets mashed with garlic or chili if requested, plus your choice of toppings. The vegan version is without cheese and butter. Also offers daily vegan soup, coffee, mint and ginger tea, and cookies.
